1009.issue: [E1009] "common.desc" in [io-package.json](https://github.com/eisbaeeer/ioBroker.piface/blob/master/io-package.json) must be an object for many languages. Found only "Control PiFace Board"

1013.issue: [W1013] Please test whether adapter can support compact mode, if not set "common.compact:false" at [io-package.json](https://github.com/eisbaeeer/ioBroker.piface/blob/master/io-package.json).

1029.issue: [E1029] Admin support not specified. Please add "common.adminUI.config = json|materialize|html|none"

1040.issue: [E1040] width and height of logo (specified at "common.extIcon") are not equal

1062.issue: [E1062] js-controller dependency missing. js-controller 5.0.19 is required as minimum, 6.0.11 is recommended. Please add to dependencies at [io-package.json](https://github.com/eisbaeeer/ioBroker.piface/blob/master/io-package.json).

1081.issue: [W1081] "common.license" in [io-package.json](https://github.com/eisbaeeer/ioBroker.piface/blob/master/io-package.json) is deprecated. Please define object "common.licenseInformation"

1084.issue: [W1084] "common.title" is deprecated and replaced by "common.titleLang". Please remove from [io-package.json](https://github.com/eisbaeeer/ioBroker.piface/blob/master/io-package.json).

1090.issue: [E1090] admin dependency missing. admin 6.17.14 is required as minimum, 7.6.17 is recommended. Please add to globalDependencies at [io-package.json](https://github.com/eisbaeeer/ioBroker.piface/blob/master/io-package.json).

1105.issue: [W1105] [io-package.json](https://github.com/eisbaeeer/ioBroker.piface/blob/master/io-package.json) schema validation error: Property "/common/desc" should be object

4036.issue: [S4036] Consider adding .vscode/settings.json file with JSON schema definitions for better development experience with Visual Studio Code.

5004.issue: [W5004] setInterval found in "piface.js", but no clearInterval detected

5022.issue: [S5022] Please consider migrating to admin 5 UI (jsonConfig) or react based UI.

5023.issue: [S5023] "package-lock.json" not found in repo! Please consider to commit it to github repository.

6005.issue: [E6005] No actual year found in copyright at [README.md](https://github.com/eisbaeeer/ioBroker.piface/blob/master/README.md). Please add "Copyright (c) 2025 Lars Weimar <eisbaeeer@gmail.com>" at start of LICENSE section.

8002.issue: [E8002] No topics found in the repository. Please go to "https://github.com/eisbaeeer/ioBroker.piface", press the settings button beside the about title and add some topics.

0033.issue: [E0033] @iobroker/adapter-core 1.0.3 specified. 3.2.3 is required as minimum, 3.3.2 (or newer) is current. Please update dependencies at [package.json](https://github.com/eisbaeeer/ioBroker.piface/blob/master/package.json)

0035.issue: [E0035] No devDependency declared for @iobroker/testing. Please add "@iobroker/testing":"5.1.1" to devDependencies at [package.json](https://github.com/eisbaeeer/ioBroker.piface/blob/master/package.json)
